Capabilities: Required skills not existent internally. Lack of organizational will. Focus only on basic transactional functionality.
Value delivered: Understanding on an ad hoc, post-mortem basis as to why it happened.

Capabilities: Business unit/function-centric knowledge creation. Lack of vision to action/compete on knowledge. Little or no information sharing across business units/functions.
Value delivered: Understanding of business and issues which must be addressed to improve individual business units/functions.
Knowledge footprint: Analytical resources embedded in local functional teams.

Capabilities: Desire to leverage knowledge driven from the top. Efforts underway to integrate / better understand internal knowledge capabilities.
Value delivered: Ability to capture current conditions, attempt to understand future trends model in place.
Knowledge footprint: Local knowledge delivery Model in place.

Capabilities: Centralized effort to understand business trends holistically. Knowledge creation, capture, and management key driver for people performance.
Value delivered: Ability to anticipate and adapt to changes in external/internal environments to obtain/retain competitive advantage analytical structure.

Capabilities: Knowledge-driven innovation driving business growth. Employees are passionate and committed to analytics.
Value delivered: Generate consistent business value through insights to obtain competitive advantage; established analytical processes embedded in overall competition organization.
Knowledge footprint: Well-established knowledge process embedded in the organization.
